title: Why was there no coverage of the 16th Annual Pleasure Island Chowder Cookoff?  I could not find any report of winners or any pictures?  This is a sustainable festival with potential to grow into an even larger tourism draw with the help of the Star\'s resources BEFORE, During, and after the event.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=13359
